definition: cooperation/coordination
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)

sentences.chinese: 一個在線協作的百科全書。

sentences.english: They're the most cooperative and the most social of all vultures.
sentences.chinese: 在禿鷲中，它們的協作性與社會化程度是最好的。

sentences.english: These voracious scavengers work together to strip the carcasses of large animals.
sentences.chinese: 這些貪婪的食腐鳥類共同協作，分食大型動物的屍體。

sentences.english: The project involves extensive cooperation with the Netherlands MoD’s C2 Support Centre.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃還包括與荷蘭國防部C2支持中心的廣泛協作。

sentences.english: He initiated and managed technology collaborations with Chinese partners for GM.
sentences.chinese: 他爲通用汽車發起並管理與中國合作伙伴的技術協作。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, I can cooperate with various people .
sentences.chinese: 道實話，我能戰林林總總的人協作。

sentences.english: India is an observer state to the Shanghai Co-operation Organisation.
sentences.chinese: 印度是上海協作組織的察看員國。

sentences.english: Organize group events so everyone can have fun and collaborate.
sentences.chinese: 組織小組活動所以每個人都能獲得樂趣和協作。

sentences.english: It has also institutionalized close coordination among government ministries on the front line of disaster relief.
sentences.chinese: 還使各部委在救災前線的密切協作制度化。

sentences.english: It also includes many team cooperations.
sentences.chinese: 它又是一場一展身手的團隊協作。

sentences.english: What do you use for collaborating with others online?
sentences.chinese: 你在網上是用什麼來同別人協作呢？

sentences.english: Collaborate with testers to finalize the acceptance criteria list for each story.
sentences.chinese: 與測試人員協作，最後確定每個故事的驗收標準清單。

sentences.english: Id like to suggest a toast to our cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 我想建議爲我們的協作乾一杯。

sentences.english: Europol said more than 100 people had been arrested in coordinated raids across 10 countries.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲刑警組織稱與10個國家協作逮捕了100多人。
客戶協作重於合同談判。

sentences.english: We will be team-oriented people with entrepreneurial spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我們將成爲具有企業家精神的協作團隊。

mechanism
to construct (sth abstract)
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
platform/terrace/flat-roofed building
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
team
an overall plan/to plan an entire project as a whole
to cooperate/in coordination with/coordinated/collaborate/collaboration/collaborative
to provide assistance/to aid
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
active/energetic/vigorous/positive (outlook)/proactive
